Pittsburgh.WSHH:
WSHH is an adult contemporary radio station based in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. The station, which is owned by Renda Broadcasting, operates at 99.7 MHz with an ERP of 17 kW. (The lower power is due to the antenna being mounted on an extremely high tower in the area.) Its transmitter is co-located with NBC television affiliate WPXI in Pittsburgh.


== History ==

WSHH signed on in 1948 as WJAS-FM, and was a very successful easy listening station during the 1970s and 1980s.
